name: Did Gug
description:
Submission for Scream Jam 2019 by the Student Game Developers at UVA (sgd.cs.virginia.edu). We started by brainstorming on the idea of a fun-filled 2D/retro game that becomes terrifying in first-person. From there, we came to the conclusion that a game about mining and exploding monsters would be spoopy as heck.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move.

 Left click to shoot your air cannon, or destroy blocks if you're close enough.

Right click to retract your air nozzle, or inflate an enemy that you've attached to.

Objective:

Kill all the enemies in each level, or find the pineapple. Try to get as far as you can!
